alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:34PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gadsden and southwestern Leon Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Quincy, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Midway, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Macon Community Park, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Fred George Park, Lake Ella, Callen Neighborhood, Wetumpka and Bloxham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
